ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: CCD, color DSP. Signal system NTSC
Minimum Illumination: 0.0 Lux. Lens: 3.6mm wide angle
Built-in 24 infrared LEDs for night vision. 420 horizontal lines
Weatherproof housing prevent from water, crush. Cable Management: Concealed wiring inside of bracket to protect the camera from vandalism
Package included: 4 x color CCD cameras, 4 x mounting brackets, 4 x 12V DC power supplies and 4 x bonus security warning decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack Color CCD Outdoor Infrared Bullet Security Cameras Day Night Vision 24 IR LEDs Wide Angle Lens for Home CCTV DVR Surveillance System with Power Supplies and Bonus Security Warning Stickers C7M
